website_summaries.verdict: Springtime collection of 14 mattes and metallics which will get you in a vacation mode.
pros: Includes unusual shades like Mediterranean which has inspired users to get creative
Amazing metallics don’t get chalky and the colors stay true once applied
cons: The brush that comes with it is basic

customer_reviews.title: Item broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this TWICE and each time I received a broken mess. The shades are broken and the eyeshadow spilled everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rhythm Knight

customer_reviews.title: SHIMMERS WERE DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: ABH has WONDERFUL shadows, however all of the top row came destroyed. Returned and waiting for a new one
customer_reviews.author: Very unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is real
customer_reviews.text: I'm not convinced this isn't a well-disguised knock off. The Anastasia palette I bought in person is MUCH creamier and more pigmented than this one and they're from the same line. I am very disappointed. I mean it's fine but it's nowhere near the same quality as my Norvina palette.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Like throwing my money away
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY ANGRY RIGHT NOW! I recently ordered this and was SO EXCITED to receive it. My excitement ended in ABSOLUTE HORROR when I opened my package to discover that my palette was all but COMPLETELY SMASHED!! EYESHADOW WENT EVERYWHERE!! SO DISAPPOINTED. I threw it in the trash and in not even sure if I want to bother to reorder it. I. Afraid of the SAME result . Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Podratz

customer_reviews.title: Good product, arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly but was a bit of a mess. One of the colors was crushed. Needed it for a event so wasn't able to return it.. so I lost some money to an unusable shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Let me clean up these reviews, MINE came on time and in perfect condition. The packaging was almost indestructible, literally. I love the colors and the pigment itself let's me know this product is 100% authentic.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Powdery and unblendable :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved the colors in here and I wanted to love it so bad, but I absolutely hate it. It is so patchy and powdery. You cant even blend out even the lightest colors. Don’t waste your money. Get the modern renaissance instead!! The powders were amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This arrived all smashed and in poor condition. My daughter was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Shadows might not survive shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this palette as a gift. The second they opened it, one of the shadows (sultry) happened to have crumbled completely and was all over the place. Another was slightly damaged as well. Photos added for proof
customer_reviews.author: Sam M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It came dirty and messed up on the pink felt part of the packaging and when I opened it it seemed like it has been opened and used before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So sad
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed. I heard this was great. But the color is soooooo light you’d have to do a thousand layers to get it to show. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The one i got from amazon seems different from sephora
customer_reviews.author: tahir

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed with the handling of this product. I’ve heard great things about this product so I ordered it to come across when delivered most of the powder was recked by time it came to me.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: i would like to know what to do in this case ?
customer_reviews.text: although i got the box with other items i order. the white bag was already opened and without items inside . and from what it looks like is a piece of makeup i ordered and supposedly was delivered today but once again white bag was already opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: The packaging had make up all over it. Honestly it looks like it has been used. If you turn it to the side you can see some of the eye shadows look more empty.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Quinones

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: man I could just stare at this all day it's beautiful definitely my fave of the abh palettes and I have a few
customer_reviews.author: lindsey loo

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged but colors are stunning!
customer_reviews.text: The product was damaged. Although I received an e-mail from Anastasia saying they would send me a new palette. Once I sent them the picture, they did not honor it and said that the product wasn't theirs. Confusing! Anyway, I ended up returning them and reordering through Anastasia's official website and love the eyeshadows!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to try this?!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew eye shadow could be so wonderful! I purchased this on prime day. I love it! The blend ability is amazing! The colors are perfect for day time use and easily transition to a night time look. I will definitely be using only this line from here on out
customer_reviews.author: amaham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors! Amazing palette!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Anastasia palette!! I have the soft glam palette (it is my favorite) but this palette has the best highlighter color I’ve ever seen plus the dark pink and red are gorgeous!!! Also Tempera is the best under eyebrow color ever. Anastasia eyeshadows are more pigmented so a little goes a long way. I love that I don’t have to keep applying to get the color I want. Watch YouTube tutorials fir this palette for inspiration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken pallet, eyeshadow everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. I have the Modern Renaissance pallet and love it. I've been wanting the Soft Glam pallet and got it on the Prime Day sale. When I opened it to use it there was eye shadow everywhere and broken color blocks. I will be returning this item today.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kukolla

customer_reviews.title: ♥️ Love ♥️
customer_reviews.text: The pigments are profound and eye-catching (no pun intended!). The palette has a great array of colors that can be blended to create a unique look, and they're deeply gorgeous. You can take these colors and blend from intense and dramatic to light and flirty. Came packages adequately and arrived safely. If you're on the fence about buying this eyeshadow palette, I don't think you'll go wrong if you decide to go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Stambaugh

customer_reviews.title: BEST EYESHADOW PALETTE EVER
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am late to the game though I've arrived. This ABH palette is BEAUTIFUL. All shades I've tried this far are gorgeous from the mattes to the satin/metallics. A little goes a long way which makes it worth the money. I can see why this palette is a staple. Great formula and range of autumn shades.
customer_reviews.author: cobaltblue

customer_reviews.title: Very Gentle on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I really like the colors in this palette. I have very sensitive eyes and for some reason the Anastasia eyeshadows don't bother me when even so called "natural" brands have bothered my eyes. I have 3 Anastasia palettes so that I can mix and match colors. They wear fairly well; I usually have to reapply if going out at night after a long day at work but I find that to be the case with most eyeshadows. I use a damp Qtip to apply the darker colors as eyeliner since I can't wear eyeliner without getting eye irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best palette ever
customer_reviews.text: the best palette ever, perfect for profesional make up, easy to blend. the best colors, u need only this palette for every occasion. i have the renascence palette, with this you don't need nothing more
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeshadow, it would be better with more foam to protect package
customer_reviews.text: ABH eyeshadow is the best. Very pigmented. Lovely shades. It could be used for daily or night out. It would be great if there are more foam (or other protectors) in the package. This eyeshadow powder is pressed lightly, and soooo easy to be shattered. My first order is broken, and I returned and exchanged, and the second one is still a little shattered, but I just keep it. Amazon customer service is the best. I'm just saying if there is more protector for this eyeshadow, it may avoid some losses.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken twice.
customer_reviews.text: Love the palette and ABH but both the original and the replacement that I ordered had broken eyeshadows. After the second one I just decided to return for cash and buy it in person from Ulta instead.
customer_reviews.author: FRL

customer_reviews.title: Authentic "Great Quality"
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, blendable, authentic and perfect packaging. I was reluctant to order because I wasn't sure if I was purchasing from Anastasia Beverly Hills. Still not sure but I feel it was a great purchase and authentic. Will continue to purchase from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Calvo

customer_reviews.title: Came broken :(
customer_reviews.text: Came with two shadows completely smashed and the whole thing is all messy and broken from it.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Anastasia palette (prism) and I have to say it's beautiful! My palette didn't come broken, but I felt it could have been packaged a lot better. It was just sitting loosely in a large box and could have easily broken, I'm actually surprised it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: kara

customer_reviews.title: Abh, HOW?? 😊
customer_reviews.text: My fave palette from abh hands down!! The color story.. Is AWESOME! I can't stop staring at cube and electric whenever I swatch them! I'm no eyeshadow expert but I didn't have any problems with it. The shadows are creamy and pigmented. You have to have a light hand. Don't dig into the pan. Also, make sure the seller is Anastasia Beverly Hills Inc if you get them here on Amazon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Wrote one review but it wouldn’t allow me to post it so here’s a second. Arrived DAMAGED! The product seemed old or used and broken into pieces. I read previous reviews before purchasing and still ordered because of the sale but no not worth the money. RUN!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shades
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful neutrals and some shiny shades. Love the rose gold. The double sided brush is perfect for highlighting and filling in the lid. Comes double wrapped. Better to buy on Amazon with free shipping than Sephora. Will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: One was crumbled and broken
customer_reviews.text: Luv luv luv the pallet but the only thing is one was crumbled and broken, 😩 kinda disappointed because of the price, I expected it to come perfect
customer_reviews.author: kelsey13

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Authentic palette, beautiful colors, easy to blend. I’m actually surprised that the palette was this great and I only ordered from here since Anastasia no longer has this palette on her site. Would definitely order from here next time I want something they run out of.
customer_reviews.author: Tialyn Rice

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE ABH
customer_reviews.text: I have both the ABH soft glam and renaissance palettes. This one is by far my favorite. I use at least one of the colors daily. My favorite is the satin light shades that I can use a bit of setting spray on my brush and spread on the inner 1/3 - 1/2 of my eyelid. Gosh! so flattering. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Bad Care During Travel
customer_reviews.text: My package was severely damaged. The box the makeup came torn and the palettes case was smashed in. I opened the palette to see the eyeshadow was intact. I won’t return as the makeup is fine but poor travel care - needs to be checked.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Wolf

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Eyeshadow Palette on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the ABH eyeshadow palettes. I’ve tried every brand but her six have the best colors, pigmentations, variety, and blendability than anything else out there. You don’t need to use a lot of color to get the desired affect and the colors always shade, blend, and highlight perfectly. I will never go back to any other eyeshadow again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alana Alissa Yoshiko

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Pallete
customer_reviews.text: I have to confess that I was a little skeptical about buying this item on Amazon but when I received it I knew that it was original. I absolutely love the colors and the pigmentation is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sachy M

customer_reviews.title: Love this soft glam pallet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeshadow pallet!! I’ve recently gotten better at eye makeup after countless YouTube tutorials and this soft glam pallet makes me excited to do my make up everyday. I love the color options!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Much like all the other reviews I have seen I placed ...
customer_reviews.text: Much like all the other reviews I have seen I placed this order for my girl friend and when she received it some of the pallets were destroyed. I want a placement please
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: This makeup wears beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I can't rave enough about this makeup. It's very long wearing without drying you out. I love the color palettes - but I specifically love that it's so easy to get on - and works so well with various skin types and shades. You wont go wrong with this makeup. Watch the videos if you need inspiration. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken product.  Crappy packaging
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed that my item came in broken especially since I used a faster shipping price. I’d return it but I need it for tonight. So upset!
customer_reviews.author: Jennaheartsvintage

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it in-store!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s definitely the real deal but it’s also a real pain in the butt. Received with one of the shades broken and scattered amongst the rest of the palette. Should’ve just gotten it in the store!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but cracked
customer_reviews.text: one of my shadows came crack, and another was chipped, but seems to have happened in shipment, also due to the softness of the pigments its not very surprising, so i kept it anyways because product still useable, blends like a charm, beautiful colors, overall Love!
customer_reviews.author: kat b isak

customer_reviews.title: Great pallete but came broken
customer_reviews.text: Well i’m a makeup artist and I love most of Anastasia’s pallete so i got this one. The company sent it broken. And it was a pretty colour that was all shattered but i still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Shirley

customer_reviews.title: ABH does it again!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality eyeshadows, this one is comparable to the Modern Renaissance palette formula. Seller ships fast with great communication. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elle B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette to own and use as often as possible!
customer_reviews.text: I have all of the palettes and this one is quite beautiful on the eyes as well as the others. The colors are very pigmented and they are very easy to blend, I’m very happy to have found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaSpaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the price when it was discounted I definitely wouldn’t pay full price for it, I do like the shadows, a little patchy but it’s decent. Love the packaging...
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The pallette has very nice warm shades of colors which I love. And the pigment is very good so it doesn't look faded like other pallettes.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Love me some ABH!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Shadow Palette! I absolutely love ABH! It takes a bit to get used to the formula, but well worth the investment for a smoky eye with pizzazz!
customer_reviews.author: B. Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors but the shadow crumbles at the lightest ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors but the shadow crumbles at the lightest touch of a brush to the palette. Unfortunate formula for what could be a five-star product.
customer_reviews.author: EJGoHard247

customer_reviews.title: Shadow is very pigmented and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter she loves this brand it is very pigmented and long wearing! Also when It arrived it was broken so I returned it and they replaced it for free and arrived next day!
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous colors
customer_reviews.text: Just simply gorgeous colors in the quality you'd expect from ABH. They don't have the formula issue that Subculture presented.
customer_reviews.author: expat on the move

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pallet. Very pigmented almost too pigmented and easy to blend. Pic of me wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovebling

customer_reviews.title: It is original 😍
customer_reviews.text: This palette is original and very good for me. I love my Anastasia beverly hills palette 😍😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Angeles Negrete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pallets
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette. I use all the shades. I am super happy with the combination of shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine was authentic, but double check the seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Subculture palette without reading the reviews. Mine arrived and was authentic, thankfully and in perfect condition. May be a good tip to watch the sellers and check them for authenticity. I was glad that mine was the real deal, it’s absolutely stunning and the price was incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Hollan

customer_reviews.title: Just no
customer_reviews.text: If you love wasting money, this palette is for you. I wanted to love it so much but no... terrible powdery all over the place. Just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mudery

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors! And since it ships from ABH and not just a retailer, you know this is a legit palette and not just a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Anna V

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: So much hate online for this palette. It's beautiful and pigmented and everything I hoped for! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Tad disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit disappointed, when I received the palette two shadows were shattered and there was dust everywhere... Some of the pans were a bit loose... The rest of the shadows have great colors and are easy to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Seems real to me!
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly dubious about this being real but it seems perfect to me-I’m not anywhere near a makeup artist so maybe I’m missing something but all seems fine to me, so relieved!!! It seems from the reviews that the prism palette is the most reliable from this seller. Honestly couldn’t be happier, ready to use tonight :)
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Spicy eye powder
customer_reviews.text: Colors weren’t as bright as shown, but still really pretty. Came in cute packaging too~
customer_reviews.author: Kind of a lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors! My sister will be very happy. Also the outside is velvet, which is a really cool feature
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: A lot of color pigment in the shadows. New colors too. Fun to play w too
customer_reviews.author: MSKerri

customer_reviews.title: Real product
customer_reviews.text: My product does not appear to be a fake, just watch the buyer you get it from. My lit numbers matched as well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good but fragile package
customer_reviews.text: The eyeshadow itself is of good quality but when it came to me so two of them were totally broken :( the package was fragile with barely some cartonpapper wrapping the eyeshadow...no protection at all for such a product. It is a long-haul delivery hence kinda complex for the return. Hope that you can improve the inside package protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful of buying ABH from Amazon, but after a thorough examination of my ordered Prism palette I'm 100% sure it's authentic (it's not my first abh palette). Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous palettes!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying make up from his company and I am very pleased. Beautiful colors that stay on all day, even in humid, summer, Florida weather. The colors are beautiful and blind well together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: These colors are so much fun. Alyssa Edwards designed the perfect palette
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Butz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful eyeshadow palette
customer_reviews.text: Glad I caught the flash sale. I had been wanting this palette for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened
customer_reviews.text: It was super broken, like how many people have described theirs when it arrived. I'm so disappointed; the colors are beautiful but it's not a strong start to using it to have to be broken :(
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Love this palette
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette as per usual with this brand. Everything came perfect, nothing was destroyed like I was anticipating. Colors look good, good pigment and lasts long
customer_reviews.author: Casey Morel

customer_reviews.title: Came broken twice
customer_reviews.text: I think the colors on this are beautiful however I’m giving it one star because the first one came with multiple shadows shattered and my replacement then came the same way. It’s highly disappointing that they don’t take the time to ship these better so that they don’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: The colors were amazing! Very rich color payoff. I give this pallet 4 stars because a few of the shades did arrived cracked up
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: Problems with the product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product twice and the first time it came out bad (I had stained one of the shadows and dusty but the same makeup) and the second one always came to me dusty! I would recommend that you pack in a more secure way! so that this kind of thing does not happen! I really felt somewhat unsatisfied by both orders! but I can not help but comment that they are excellent products!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Looooove this!!
customer_reviews.text: The color is spot on (chestnut) for my dark brown hair. Best brow makeup I’ve ever had so far!
customer_reviews.author: Xtina

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors but there isn’t much color payoff
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors but there isn’t much color payoff. For Anastasia Beverly Hills I expected a lot more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Woodham

customer_reviews.title: Refund please!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE! Before I could even take it out of the box, eyeshadow was falling everywhere. It’s broken and actually seems used. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LaDee Davila

customer_reviews.title: Great!!! But watch the price!
customer_reviews.text: A little high on the price, but like all Anastasia products, it’s great!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Kipfer’s

customer_reviews.title: Spot on pigments!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone of this palettes is fire! Pigments are spot on and look amazing! I have four of them already.
customer_reviews.author: LiLiB

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken shades
customer_reviews.text: Came without any air bag/foam or any protection. No wonder why most of the reviews say they got broken palettes.
customer_reviews.author: Orange_OwO

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE Condition
customer_reviews.text: This is the way I received the eyeshadow palette I bought some days ago. Completely broken and in a terrible condition. Looks completely old and used. I'm in total regret of having purchased this and feel I threw my money away.
customer_reviews.author: John J Tobbaji

customer_reviews.title: Great palette but poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great and it's real rather than a knock off but it looks like someone tossed the palette around before delivering it to me, pretty disappointing but it's too much of a hassle to return 🤷🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adore it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my old Prism palette that I completely used up... one of my favorite ABH palettes ever.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is so beautiful and I find it easy to use in spite is all the videos I watched that were not impressed with it. Every look I have created has turned out even better than I expected. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite Anastasia Beverly Hills Palettes! A must for your collection!
customer_reviews.author: David Ambos

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift and the receiver loves them.
customer_reviews.author: flugelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Pinterest helped me a lot
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like I have enough skill for how amazing this pallet is. It's incredible, and the outside of the case is velvet?! I missed that in all of my researched. So I was surprised. Anyways, it is an incredible pallet. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: All together it was a nice palette, but two of the square eyeshadow pans were all messed up and I had to fix another
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Mostly mat shades which I really like
customer_reviews.text: I love this pallette except there is a lot of fallout and a few of the colors don't blend well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pallet!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I can get Anastasia products on amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Highly pigmented, colors blend easily
customer_reviews.text: Highly pigmented eyeshadows, beautiful colors. Have just applied so I will add to this review after I wear them for 2-3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Support

customer_reviews.title: Mirror broken and some damage
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and brand. Very pigmented and the eyeshadow went on smooth. Unfortunately, palette was delivered and the mirror was broken and some of the shadows were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but was NOT happy to have my eyeshadows scattered throughout the pallet!! It was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Addyson Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I received it with 4 of the color pallets broken up into dust. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: vanessa betty

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended to me but it gets everywhere. This us an Anastasia product so I'm disappointed because I usually like their stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kadi Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: This product was delivered late and damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered damaged. This was supposed to be a birthday present and now it will be a month late.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Browning

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN PALLETTE
customer_reviews.text: This pallete took over a week to arrived was suppose to be a mothers day gift and arrived broken. So upset and dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Quezada

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it doesn't fade away so fast
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Gutierrez

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills Eyeshadow Palette, Riviera
feature_bullets: An essential bright makeup palette that includes 14 all-new matte and metallic shades for eyes and face.
The full-pigment powder formula delivers high color payoff and intensity
Contains 14 all-new shadows and pressed pigments, with 8 ultra-mattes, 4 metallics and 2 duo chromes
Wide shade range allows you to create everything from cool- and warm-toned neutral looks to daring bright eye looks, shimmering glam looks and bold smoky eyes
Includes a dual-ended brush and a large mirror housed inside travel-friendly packaging
